item.title: Kotlin-Java interop: function references and SAM conversions
item.description: Though all the things below are pretty obvious if being careful while dealing with Kotlin-Java interop, I decided still to write short note about one particular issue with function references (from Kotlin side) and SAM conversions (from Java side). Function reference Function reference is a good way to pass function as a parameter without explicitly using lambdas.
